name: modal
label: {Boolean}
desc: Sets the dialog display mode, When set to true a screen dimmer will be used and access to the page contents will be prevented.

name: basic
label: {Boolean}
desc: Sets the dialog basic view mode, which hides both header/footer reserving their space as not to affect other options such as resize, move, maximize...etc.

name: frameless
label: {Boolean}
desc: Sets the dialog frameless view mode, which hides both header/footer. But footer space is not reserved, the content author must be aware that dialog header/commands might overlap with contents.

name: movable
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog is movable.

name: moveBounded
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a movable dialog is allowed to go off-screen or not.
script: alertify.{component}('Try moving this off the screen').set({'movable':true, 'moveBounded': true});

name: resizable
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog is resizable.

name: closable
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Close button is displayed in the header of the dialog. In modal dialogs, clicking the dimmer will also trigger a close command unless closableByDimmer was set to false.

name: closableByDimmer
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking the dimmer of a Closable Modal dialog should trigger a close command or not.

name: maximizable
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Maximize button is displayed in the header of the dialog.

name: startMaximized
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog should start in a maximized state or not.

name: pinnable
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Pin button is displayed in the header of the dialog (modeless only).
script: alertify.{component}('Modeless: false, Pinnable: false. Try scrolling the page!').set({'pinnable': false, 'modal':true});

name: transition
label: {String}
desc: Gets or sets the transition effect to be used when showing/hiding the dialog

name: onshow
label: {Function}
desc: Gets or sets a function to invoke when the dialog is shown

name: onclose
label: {Function}
desc: Gets or sets a function to invoke when the dialog is closed

name: onfocus
label: {Function}
desc: Gets or sets a function to invoke when the dialog is focused for the first time.

name: overflow
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content overflow is managed by the dialog or not.

name: padding
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content padding is managed by the dialog or not.

name: autoReset
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog should reset size/position on window resize.

name: setHeader
label: chainable
desc: Sets the contents of the dialog header.

name: setContent
label: chainable
desc: Sets the contents of the dialog.
remark: Important: This method replaces the entire dialog contents. For example, if used with a prompt dialog, the input field will be lost.

name: setting
desc: Gets or Sets dialog settings/options

params.name: key
params.desc: A string specifying a setting/option key or object holding key/value pairs.

params.name: value
params.desc: The value associated with the key (in case it was a string).

remark: A separate .get() and .set() aliases are also available.

name: set
label: chainable
desc: Sets dialog settings/options.

params.name: key
params.desc: A string specifying a setting/option key or object holding key/value pairs.

params.name: value
params.desc: The value associated with the key (in case it was a string).

remark: This method is an alias for .setting() method set mode.

name: get
desc: Gets the dialog setting/option value.
remark: This method is an alias for .setting() method get mode.

name: maximize
label: chainable
desc: Maximizes the dialog.

name: restore
label: chainable
desc: Restores the maximized dialog.
script: div.innerHTML = 'This will be resored in 3 seconds';
div.innerHTML = 'This will be resored in ' + i + ' seconds.';

name: pin
label: chainable
desc: Pins a modeless dialog to the screen, preventing it from moving with body scroll.
script: alertify.{component}('This is a modeless dialog, pinned to the screen.').set('modal', false).pin();

name: unpin
label: chainable
desc: Un-pins a modeless dialog from the screen, allowing it to move with body scroll.
script: alertify.{component}('This is a modeless dialog, not pinned to the screen.').set('modal', false).unpin();

name: isOpen
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets a value that indicates whether the dialog is open.

name: isModal
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets a value that indicates whether the dialog is modal.

name: isMaximized
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets a value that indicates whether the dialog is maximized.

name: isPinned
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets a value that indicates whether the dialog is pinned.

name: show
label: chainable
desc: Shows the dialog

name: showModal
label: chainable
desc: Updates the dialog display mode to Modal and shows the dialog.

name: close
label: chainable
desc: Closes the current dialog instance.
remark:
Use alertify.closeAll() to close all open dialogs.
Use alertify.closeOthers() to close all open dialogs except this one.

name: closeOthers
label: chainable
desc: Closes all open dialogs except this one.
remark: Use alertify.closeAll() to close all open dialogs.

name: moveTo
label: chainable
desc: Move the dialog to a specific X,Y coordinates.

name: resizeTo
label: chainable
desc: Resize the dialog to a specific width/height (the dialog must be 'resizable').

params.name: width
params.desc: The new dialog width in pixels or precent (#.#%).

params.name: height
params.desc: The new dialog height in pixels or precent (#.#%).

remark:
The dialog must be resizable and it can be resized to a minimum width equal to the initial display width and a minimum height equal to the sum of header and footer heights.
You can also pass a percent of the document clientWidth/clientHeight.

name: bringToFront
label: chainable
desc: Brings the dialog to front of other dialogs (Will do nothing if the dialog is behind an open modal).

name: destroy
desc: Destroys the dialog instance, this will close the dialog, delete the associted DOM and reset all settings to its initial state.
